item.title: Improving my GUI to add more features to my Macro Pad
item.description: Read the technical details on the project page DOC PLAN Read Mini Macro Pad before this one “This is part 2 of my MMP project” What’s wrong with v1 / story Solution idea Expanding GUI in fyne Fun with DnD Having issues with state / GUI not syncing Realize I need to organize / structure my code better I find it best to learn by doing, so to learn MVC I need to implement it myself.
